# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-vnfm-zte-1.0.0-RC1.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1068/org/openo/nfvo/drivers-vnfm-svnfm-zte-vmanager/1.0.0-RC1/drivers-vnfm-svnfm-zte-vmanager-1.0.0-RC1.zip && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-vnfm-zte-1.0.0-RC1.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-vnfm-zte-1.0.0-RC1.zip
EXPOSE 8410
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1068 > VERSION
